peer.description: The label for a singular peer

startTorrent.description: The text for the start torrent button

stopTorrent.description: The text for the stop torrent button

unsupportedFileType.description: Displayed when the media viewer doesn't know what to do with a file

saveFileColumnHeader.description: The header for the file list column with save buttons

sizeColumnHeader.description: The header for the column displaying the size of files

saveFile.description: Displayed in the save file button

saveAllFiles.description: Displayed on the button for downloading all files in the torrent

filesHeader.description: The heading above the files table

fileListLoading.description: Message showed while the file list for a torrent is loading

startTorrentPrompt.message: Click "Start Torrent" to begin your download
startTorrentPrompt.description: Message showed to prompt the user to start the torrent. The "Start Torrent" text should match startTorrent

downloadingStatus.description: Status message shown while the torrent is downloading

seedingStatus.description: Status message shown when the torrent is seeding

remainingTimeText.description: Text shown with the remaining time, as in '5m 2s remaining'

poweredByWebTorrent.description: The powered by notice. The text 'WebTorrent' should not be translated

disableHint.message: The WebTorrent extension can be disabled from Brave settings
disableHint.description: Hint message telling the user how to disable WebTorrent. 'WebTorrent' should not be translated

privacyWarningDetail.message: When you click "Start Torrent" Brave will begin downloading pieces of the torrent file from other users and uploading to them in turn. This action will share that you're downloading this file. Others may be able to see what you're downloading and/or determine your public IP address. The download may bypass your proxy settings.
privacyWarningDetail.description: The detail of the privacy warning, explaining the risks. Note: The "Start Torrent" translation should be the same as 'startTorrent'

loadingTorrentInfo.description: Message shown while loading torrent metadata

copyMagnetLink.description: Text for button to copy the magnet link

saveTorrentFile.description: Text displayed on the Save .torrent File button. '.torrent' should not be translated because it's a file extension

notATorrentError.description: Displayed when trying to open a file which is not a torrent. Displayed in a dialog.
